reviews.review: Very Nice Professor. But the assignment is a lot of work. There is 20 pages of reading every week and the lecture is not very interesting. However he is available during office hours and will help you with the papers.

name: HIST221
title: Asian American History
description: Cross-listed with AAST201. Credit only granted for: AAST201 or HIST221. Introduction to the history of Asian Americans in the United States and the Americas and to the field of Asian American Studies, from an interdisciplinary perspective. Topics include theories of race and ethnicity; Asian migration and diaspora to the Americas; Asian American work and labor issues; gender, family, and communities; nationalism and nativism, and anti-Asian movements; Asian Americans in World War II, the Cold War, and the issues in the civil rights & post-civil rights era.
